name: Freeton WP
author: Weborsha

sections.description:
Let the users login to wordpress website via a Free TON Debot.

Excellent Support

If you have any problems with setting up the plugin, you could ask the developer for assistance.

Why Fee TON Debot Login?

  • Integration of the Free TON Ecosystem with wordress
  • Fast, easy and secure registration
  • Removes the need for email verification
  • No “forgot password?” stuff
  • Provides user’s Free TON wallet address

Features

  • Safe, secure and easy login method
  • User data is trustworthy – verified by TON.Surf
  • Can be used to prevent spam registrations
  • Easy to install and set up for the admin
  • Can be used to let new users sign up

Contribution
Development occurs on Github, any contribution is welcome.

  • Note: You can also contribute in translating this plugin into your local language. Contact the developer.
sections.installation:
1. Download and deploy Free TON Debot (Solidity Debot file in https://github.com/weborsha/WpFreeTON)
  2. Upload the freeton-wp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install zip archive.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress. After activation, you should see the menu of this plugin the admin panel
  4. Put your Debot address in the plugin settings
  5. Save changes

Enjoy!
